Perfil · Member

Ana Luísa Carvalho Mendonça

Undergraduate · Engineering

???

Thermodynamics and computational simulations of alloys.

Da cidade fluminense de Paraíba do Sul, fascinada por entender como as coisas são feitas; usa simulações e termodinâmica para explorar materiais como engenheira em formação.

Thermodynamics Undergraduate research

From Paraíba do Sul (RJ), Ana has always enjoyed understanding how things are made. Strong in Math and Physics in high school, she found in Engineering a way to turn curiosity into solutions.

At ComputEEL/MatSci she applies thermodynamics and simulations to investigate alloys and intermetallics, developing computational tools during her degree.

Topics of interest: alloy design, thermodynamics, simulation workflows for students.

ComputEEL/MatSci

Computational Materials Science · DEMAR · EEL/USP

E-mail: computeel@usp.br
